definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Bain's device transmitted strictly black and white images.
sentences.chinese: 貝因的記錄電報機傳送嚴格意義上的黑白圖像。

sentences.english: Send the message on the telegraph.
sentences.chinese: 這個消息用電報機發出。

sentences.english: The ideal arrangement is to have a teleprinter communicating between the two rooms.
sentences.chinese: 理想的條件是兩個房間由一臺電傳打字電報機聯繫。
他是像電報機一樣在發信息嗎？

sentences.english: Jin Yunbo followed the telegraph signal Qin Hanjie came to the Qi mansion.
sentences.chinese: 晉雲波追隨着秦漢傑的電報機信號來到了戚公館。
